程序包 com.google.common.xml

Escapers for XML.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    XmlEscapers
    Escaper instances suitable for strings to be included in XML attribute values and elements' text contents.

Escapers for XML.

This package is a part of the open-source Guava library.
